languages.text: {n}Кассия хмурится, прикрывая рот ладонью.{/n} "Эти цвета... словно бы копия с обычных цветов Лорд-капитана..."
{n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия хмурится, прикрывая рот ладонью.{/n} "Эти цвета... словно бы копия с обычных цветов Лорд-капитана..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Frowning, Cassia covers her mouth with her hand.{/n} "Those colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."
{n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."
{n}Barely holding back a gasp of astonishment, Cassia covers her mouth with her hands.{/n} "Those colours... The Lord Captain! It's {name}! In someone else's body! How... is that possible?"
{n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."
{n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."
{n}Frowning, Cassia covers her mouth with her hand.{/n} "Those colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."
{n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."

languages.text: {n}卡西娅皱起了眉，用手捂住了嘴。{/n}“这些颜色……和我平时在舰长大人身边看到的那些颜色，几乎没有任何区别……”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅皱起了眉，用手捂住了嘴。{/n}“这些颜色……和我平时在舰长大人身边看到的那些颜色，几乎没有任何区别……”

languages.text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y se tapa la boca con la mano.{/n} «Estos colores... es como si alguien hubiera copiado los que suelo ver en torno a{rt_mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia frunce el ceño y se tapa la boca con la mano.{/n} «Estos colores... es como si alguien hubiera copiado los que suelo ver en torno a{rt_mf|l| la} Lord Capitán».

languages.text: {n}Kaşlarını çatan Cassia, elleriyle ağzını kapatıyor.{/n} "Bu renkler... Sanki Lord Kaptan'da gördüklerimden kopyalanmış gibiler..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaşlarını çatan Cassia, elleriyle ağzını kapatıyor.{/n} "Bu renkler... Sanki Lord Kaptan'da gördüklerimden kopyalanmış gibiler..."

languages.text: {n}カシアは眉をひそめ、手で口元を覆う。{/n}「この色…まるで、あたくしが普段ロード・キャプテンの周囲で目にするものを模写したかのようです…」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは眉をひそめ、手で口元を覆う。{/n}「この色…まるで、あたくしが普段ロード・キャプテンの周囲で目にするものを模写したかのようです…」

languages.text: {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils et couvre sa bouche d'une main.{/n} « Ces couleurs... C'est comme si elles avaient été copiées sur celles que je vois d'ordinaire autour {rt_mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}... »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia fronce les sourcils et couvre sa bouche d'une main.{/n} « Ces couleurs... C'est comme si elles avaient été copiées sur celles que je vois d'ordinaire autour {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}... »

languages.text: {n}Cassia runzelt die Stirn und hält sich besorgt die Hand vor den Mund.{/n} "Diese Farben ... Als wären sie Kopien der Farben, die den Lord Captain sonst umgeben ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia frowns, covering her mouth with her hand.{/n} "These colours... It is as though they had been copied from those I usually see around the Lord Captain..."
